item.title: My Twelth Post
item.description:
Here is a title

Here is a good bit of summary for the twelth post. It is natural to accompany the summary with links to the original content, and a common design pattern is to see this link in the form of a “Read More …” button. See the .RelPermalink, .Permalink, and .Truncated page variables.The Internet uses a lot of electricity. For most of the world, producing electricity means the burning of fossil fuels, this in turn means that the Internet’s carbon footprint may have already eclipsed global air travel.
